frase: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
If there is no struggle, there is no progress
Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe
Your journey matters, even if no one else understands it
You’re not lost—you’re learning new paths. Keep moving
Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice
Believe in yourself and anything is possible
I never dreamed of success. I worked for it
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
Each step you take, even in doubt, is progress
You’ve overcome storms stronger than today’s clouds. Keep going
You can’t cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water
Fear is just a story you tell yourself
There are no limits to what you can accomplish, except the limits you place on your own thinking
Don’t be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try
You are not what you achieve, you are what you overcome
Believe you can and you’re halfway there
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change
Courage is knowing something might hurt and doing it anyway
Don’t wait for the opportunity. Create it
Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try
Failure is not falling down, but refusing to get up
Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion
You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step
The code you write reflects how you think
Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now
If the plan doesn’t work, change the plan, not the goal
If you spend more on coffee than on cybersecurity, you will be hacked. And you deserve it
The greatest risk is thinking you’re not at risk
Inspiration doesn’t always arrive. Sometimes you have to provoke it
